name: News Reporter
description: When you rescue this Bystander, draw a card.

name: Paramedic
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you may KO a Wound from your hand or from any player's discard pile.

name: Radiation Scientist
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you may KO one of your Heroes or a Hero from your discard pile.

name: Computer Hacker
description: When you kidnap this Bystander, draw an extra card when you draw a new hand at the end of your turn.

name: Engineer
description: When you kidnap this Bystander, reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs 0 - KO it.

name: Public Speaker
description: When you kidnap this Bystander, gain 1 recruit.

name: Rockstar
description: When you kidnap this Bystander, kidnap another Bystander.

name: Banker
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you get +2 Recruit, usable only to recruit Heroes in the HQ space under the Bank.

name: Alligator Trapper
description: When you rescue this Bystander, [b]Patrol the Sewers:[/b] If it's empty, you get +2 Recruit.

name: Shapeshifted Copycat
description: When you rescue this Bystander, this card becomes a Villain with 3 Attack and enters the city. It gains the ability: "[b]Fight[/b]: KO one of your Heroes."

name: Undercover Agent
description: When you rescue this Bystander, a player of your choice gains a S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer.

name: Aspiring Hero
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain a Sidekick.

name: Comic Shop Keeper
description: When you rescue this Bystander, reveal the top three cards of the Hero Deck. The player of your choice gains one of them that costs 3 or less. Put the rest back in any order.

name: Detective Wolverine
description: When you rescue this Bystander, [b]Investigate[/b] the Villain Deck for a Villain worth 1 VP and put it in your Victory Pile.

name: Cypher
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

gainedAlly.ability: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the other.

name: Heartless Computer Scientist
description: When you rescue this Bystander

gainedAlly.ability: Tech: You may KO a card from your hand or discard pile.

name: Karma
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

gainedAlly.ability: Reveal the top card of the Hero Deck. You get +Attack equal to its printed Attack.

name: Magik
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

name: Magma
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

gainedAlly.ability: Chose one: Draw a card or you get +2 Attack.

name: Martial Arts Master
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

name: Mirage
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

name: Sunspot
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

name: Warlock
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

name: Wolfsbane
description: When you rescue this Bystander, gain it as a Hero.

name: Actor
description: When you rescue this Bystander, choose a Hero in the HQ that costs 4 or less. You get its printed Recruit and Attack.

name: Animal Trainer
description: When you rescue this Bystander, each [BGCOLOR=#CC9900][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Instinct[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] and/or [BGCOLOR=#FF0000][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Covert[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] Hero currently in the HQ costs 1 less this turn.

name: Tourist Couple
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you get +1 Recruit if the Rooftops are empty and +1 Recruit if the Bridge is empty.

name: Triage Nurse
description: When you rescue this Bystander, look at the top three cards of your deck. KO one, discard one, and put one back.

name: Bulldozer Driver
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you may move a Villain to an adjacent city space. If another Villain is already there, swap them.

name: Double Agent Of S.H.I.E.L.D.
description: When you rescue this Bystander, play a copy of one of your S.H.I.E.L.D. Heroes or HYDRA allies.

name: Fortune Teller
description: When you rescue this Bystander, guess "zero" or "not zero." Then reveal the top card of your deck and check its cost. If you guessed right, draw that card.

name: Photographer
description: This Bystander is worth +1 VP for each Hero you have that costs 7 or more among all your cards at the end of the game.

name: Stan Lee
description: When you rescue this Bystander, say a Hero name. Then reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put one of those cards with that exact Hero name into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

name: Damage Control
description: When you rescue this Bystander, reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put any that cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

name: Happy Hogan
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you may KO a Wound from your hand or from any player's discard pile.

name: Jane Foster
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you may KO one of your Heroes or a Hero from your discard pile.

name: Peggy Carter
description: When you rescue this Bystander, draw a card.

name: Pepper Potts
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you get +2 Recruit, usable only to recruit Heroes in the HQ space under the Bank.

name: Bulldozer Driver
description: When you rescue this Bystander, you may move a Villain to an adjacent city space. If another Villain is already there, swap them.

name: Double Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.
description: When you rescue this Bystander, play a copy of one of your S.H.I.E.L.D. Heroes or HYDRA Allies.

name: Forklift Driver
description: When you rescue this Bystander, put any number of Heroes from the HQ on the bottom of the Hero Deck.

name: Fortune Teller
description: When you rescue this Bystander, guess "zero" or "not zero." Then reveal the top card of your deck and check its cost. If you guessed right, draw that card.

name: Photographer
description: This Bystander is worth +1 Victory Points for each Hero you have that costs 7 Cost or more among all your cards at the end of the game.
